text: Fantastic Planet (, , lit. "The Wild Planet") is a 1973 French Czech science fiction adult animated movie directed by René Laloux and was based on the 1957 novel Oms en série by Stefan Wul. It is about life of humans on a fantastic planet inhabited by giant blue humanoids. The humans are considered aliens. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1973 science fiction movies Category:1970s animated movies Category:French animated movies Category:French science fiction movies Category:Czech science fiction movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies set on fictional planets
title: Fantastic Planet
